title: Assessing greywater characteristics in the sahel region and perception of the local population on its reuse in agriculture
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Cheik Omar Tidiane Compaoré, Amidou S. Ouili, Sandrine G. Zongo, Djamilatou Dabré, Ynoussa Maiga, Iliassou Mogmenga, Dagoro Palé, Raogo Guy Noel Tindouré, Mahamadi Nikiema, Cheik Amadou Tidiane Ouattara, Aboubakar Sidiki Ouattara
